register.name: DEMCR
register.description: Debug Exception and Monitor Control Register

field.name: VC_MMERR
field.description: Enable halting debug trap on a MemManage exception

field.name: VC_NOCPERR
field.description: Enable halting debug trap on a UsageFault caused by an access to a Coprocessor

field.name: VC_CHKERR
field.description: Enable halting debug trap on a UsageFault exception caused by a checking error, for example an alignment check error

field.name: VC_STATERR
field.description: Enable halting debug trap on a UsageFault exception caused by a state information error, for example an Undefined Instruction exception

field.name: VC_BUSERR
field.description: Enable halting debug trap on a BusFault exception

field.name: VC_INTERR
field.description: Enable halting debug trap on a fault occurring during exception entry or exception return

field.name: VC_HARDERR
field.description: Enable halting debug trap on a HardFault exception

field.name: MON_PEND
field.description: Sets or clears the pending state of the DebugMonitor exception

field.name: MON_STEP
field.description: Setting this bit to 1 makes the step request pending

field.name: TRCENA
field.description: Global enable for all DWT and ITM features
